quotes.author: R. Half
quotes.quote: When ability exceeds ambition or ambition exceeds ability, the likelihood of success is limited.

quotes.author: E. Hubbard
quotes.quote: It's fine thing to have ability, but ability to discover ability in others, is the true test.

quotes.author: D.A. Laird
quotes.quote: Abilities wither under fault-finding, and blossom under encouragement.

quotes.author: B. Seneca
quotes.quote: To be what are, and to become what we are capable of becoming, is the only end of life.

quotes.author: H. Thoreau
quotes.quote: I know of no more encouraging fact, than the unquestionable ability of man, to elevate his life by conscious endeavor.

quotes.author: B. Washington
quotes.quote: The world cares very little about what a man or women knows; it is what a man or women is able to do that counts
